name: 8Bit Hardcore: Zombie Blast
description:
8Bit Hardcore: Zombie Blast is a super hardcore zombie shooter. Dodge monster hordes, drive them together and blast them to pieces with a grenade launcher! Fight your way through infected world with a cannon in your hands and a partner covering your back. Very challenging, but yet fun, fast paced gameplay won't let you relax for a second. Kill as much monsters as you can and compare your results with your friends and the whole world! Earn coins and buy more powerfull weapons and more characters!

Old school pixel art and chiptune music are delivering retro atmosphere. Easy to play, but hard to master gameplay is making game addictive. If you're into action and want to test your reaction - 8Bit Hardcore: Zombie Blast is for you!

Features:
- Super hardcore and challenging
- Retro pixel art
- Bullet and blast hell
- Over 12 survivors
- Over 5 different weapons
- You're never alone! There's always a partner covering your back
- Side-scrolling action gameplay
- Collect gold coins to unlock new characters and weapons
- Conquer the leaderboard and unlock all achievements!

Future updates will bring you more survivors, weapons, zombies, monsters and environments.
